net.sourceforge.cilib.Algorithm
Interface AlgorithmFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
XMLAlgorithmFactory
public interface AlgorithmFactory

A factory used to produce an Algorithm must satisfy this interface. The CoOperativeOptimisationAlgorithm makes use of an AlgorithmFactory to create each participating algorithm. XMLAlgorithmFactory implements this interface so that algorithms can be created for the simulator.

To avoid the use of XML you can create your own implementation of AlgorithmFactory to create appropriately configured algorithms.

Author:
espeer

Method Summary

          Returns a newly constructed algorithm.
